scripts.watch: parcel watch assets/js/app.js --global Redgoose --no-autoinstall --out-dir assets/dist --cache-dir cache/parcel --public-url ./
scripts.build: rm -rf assets/dist && parcel build assets/js/app.js --global Redgoose --no-source-maps --out-dir assets/dist --public-url ./ --cache-dir cache/parcel
